Package net.proteusframework.core.xml

XML related utilities.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseXMLHandler
    Base class for XML parsing handlers.
    GenericParser
    XML parser that fires actions for registered tags.
    OutputCDataTagListener
    Wraps content in CDATA decl.
    RemoveTagTransform
    Remove tags.
    SkipTagListener
    Tag listener that skips tag but renders children.
    TagListener<C extends TagListenerConfiguration>
    Tag listener for generic parsing code.
    TagListenerConfiguration
    TagListener configuration.
    TransformTagListener
    Base class for transforming tag listeners.
    XMLFragmentValidator
    Validator utility for xml fragments.
    XMLFragmentValidator.SingleChild
    ContentHandler that verifies that the root element has a single child element.
    XMLUtil
    Various Xml parsing related utils.
    XMLUtil.ClassPathEntityResolver
    Simple entity resolver.

Package net.proteusframework.core.xml Description

XML related utilities.
  • GenericParser - provides a tag listener based approach to parsing XML.
  • XMLFragmentValidator - provides a utility for validation of a XML document fragment.
  • XMLUtil - provides parsing utility functions, validation utility, line number utility, and XML identity generation that takes into consideration extra white space and unordered attributes.
